scripts.build: bash -c 'set -e; rm -rf dist; mkdir -p dist; ./build-env.sh; echo "--- DEBUG: Contents of dist/ after env-config.js generation ---"; ls -la dist/; node esbuild.config.js; echo "--- DEBUG: Contents of dist/ after esbuild.config.js execution ---"; ls -la dist/; echo "--- DEBUG: First 10 lines of bundle.js (if it exists) ---"; if [ -f dist/bundle.js ]; then head -n 10 dist/bundle.js; else echo "dist/bundle.js not found!"; fi; npm run tailwind:build; cp index.html dist/index.html; cp _redirects dist/_redirects'
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only hosting
